mapper.select: SELECT A.tradeId, A.goodsCategory, A.tradeImage, A.tradeTitle, A.userId, A.tradeDate, IFNULL(B.count, 0) AS tradeLike FROM tradeBoard A LEFT JOIN (SELECT tradeId, COUNT(*) AS count FROM tradeLike GROUP BY tradeId) B ON A.tradeId = B.tradeId
SELECT tradeId, goodsCategory, tradeImage, tradeTitle, userId, tradeLike, tradeDate FROM tradeBoard WHERE tradeTitle LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tradeBoard(tradeId, tradeTitle, tradeContents, tradeLike, tradeStatus, tradePrice, tradeImage, goodsCategory, userId) VALUES(#{tradeId}, #{tradeTitle}, #{tradeContents}, ${tradeLike}, #{tradeStatus}, ${tradePrice}, #{tradeImage}, #{goodsCategory}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT nickName, point FROM user WHERE userId = #{userId};

SELECT A.tradeId, A.goodsCategory, A.tradeImage, A.tradeTitle, A.tradeContents, A.tradePrice, A.tradeStatus, A.tradeDate, IFNULL(B.count, 0) AS tradeLike FROM tradeBoard A LEFT JOIN (SELECT tradeId, COUNT(*) AS count FROM tradeLike GROUP BY tradeId) B ON A.tradeId = B.tradeId WHERE A.tradeId = #{tradeId}
